name: Seismitoad
author: Shigenori Negishi
flavor_text: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.

abilities.name: Bulldoze
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a card, shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of it.

attacks.name: Tremulous Fist
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.
